Ludwig van Beethoven (15 Disemba 1770 - 26 Maachị 1826) ka a na-ahụta dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ede egwú kachasị na nke kacha nwee mmetụta na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke egwu ọdịda anyanwụ
Beethoven bụ onye bụ isi na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ọdịda anyanwụ na omenala ụwa: a na-enwe mmasị n'egwú ya n'ụwa nile maka ike ya, mmalite ya, mmeri, na dike
Beethoven dere ọtụtụ n'ime egwu ya mgbe ntị chiri na ahụike siri ike; nke a mere ọtụtụ ndị ji ewere ya dị ka dike na nnukwu mmadụ.
A maara Beethoven dị ka onye nnọchianya nke European Romanticism
Ọ na-etolite akwa mmiri n'etiti Classicism nke Mozart na Haydn na Romanticism nke Wagner na Liszt
Egwu ya nwere mmetụta siri ike na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndị na-ede egwú na ndị na-egwu egwu narị afọ nke 19 na nke 20, ma na-aga n'ihu ruo taa.
A maara ya karịsịa maka egwu egwu itoolu ya (nke atọ, nke ise na nke itoolu bụ ndị a ma ama), 32 piano sonatas, 16 string quartets, na Missa Solemnis.
